# This script lists files which have to be excluded from code
# analysis at Open Hub (http://www.openhub.net/p/ultradefrag/):

# exclude auxiliary stuff
Disallow: /project/
Disallow: /stock/
Disallow: /test/
Disallow: /web/

# exclude external libraries
Disallow: /trunk/src/console/getopt1.c
Disallow: /trunk/src/console/getopt.c
Disallow: /trunk/src/console/getopt.h
Disallow: /trunk/src/dll/zenwinx/prb.c
Disallow: /trunk/src/dll/zenwinx/prb.h
Disallow: /trunk/src/lua/
Disallow: /trunk/src/lua5.1/
Disallow: /trunk/src/lua-gui/
Disallow: /trunk/src/tools/patch/wx/

# exclude auto-generated stuff
Disallow: /trunk/src/dll/zenwinx/case-tables.h

# exclude documentation
Disallow: /trunk/doc/
Disallow: /trunk/src/dll/udefrag/rsc/
Disallow: /trunk/src/dll/zenwinx/rsc/
Disallow: /trunk/src/dll/zenwinx/index.html
